contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Xupu County |translit_lang1 = [[Chinese character|Chinese]] |translit_lang1_type = [[Chinese character|Chinese]] |translit_lang1_info = 溆浦 |translit_lang1_type1 = [[Pinyin]] |translit_lang1_info1 = Xùpǔ |postal_code_type = Postal code |settlement_type = [[County (People's Republic of China)|County]] |image_skyline = XuPu.JPG |image_map = |map_caption = Location of the county |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[People's Republic of China|China]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Hunan]] |subdivision_type2 = Prefecture |subdivision_name2 = [[Huaihua]] |area_total_km2 = |population = |population_as_of = |population_density_km2 = auto |latNS = |latd = |latm = |lats = |longEW = |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = }} '''Xupu County''' is a county of [[Hunan]], [[China]]. It is under the administration of [[Huaihua]] city. ==References== *[http://www.xzqh.org/html/index.html www.xzqh.org] {{zh icon}} {{County-level divisions of Hunan}} {{coord|27|54|29|N|110|35|17|E|region:CN-43_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Hunan]] {{Hunan-geo-stub}}
